word: Mary had followed John and Peter to the tomb; when they returned to Jerusalem, she remained. As she looked into the empty tomb, grief filled her heart. Looking in, she saw the two angels; one at the head and the other at the foot where Jesus had lain. \93Woman, why weepest thou?\94 they asked her. \93Because they have taken away my Lord,\94 she answered, \93and I know not where they have laid Him.\94
